channel.title: Comments on: Chorizo, Pumpkin and Feta Pasta

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Parita - Presto Pasta nights sound fun!
Hi Steph - it works with everything else - hope you like it with pasta!
Hi Arwen - I hope you do try it. Feel free to add and remove ingredients as you see fit :)
Hi Alexandra - it certainly can't fail :P
Hi Beta Gal - It does sound a bit odd at first, but the flavour is much better and more interesting than expected.
Hi Lorraine - Sounds great!
Hi Maria - I like the sound of that too, I'll have to try it sometime :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Parita – Presto Pasta nights sound fun!

Hi Steph – it works with everything else – hope you like it with pasta!

Hi Arwen – I hope you do try it. Feel free to add and remove ingredients as you see fit ðŸ™‚

Hi Alexandra – it certainly can’t fail ðŸ˜›

Hi Beta Gal – It does sound a bit odd at first, but the flavour is much better and more interesting than expected.

Hi Lorraine – Sounds great!

Hi Maria – I like the sound of that too, I’ll have to try it sometime ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Yumm, that sounds delicious! Imake something very similar, but instead of using the tomato base i just saute everything in a little olive oil and chuck in some baby spinach leaves to finish it. Its so yummy! pumpkin and chorizo were made to be together!
item.content:encoded: Yumm, that sounds delicious! Imake something very similar, but instead of using the tomato base i just saute everything in a little olive oil and chuck in some baby spinach leaves to finish it. Its so yummy! pumpkin and chorizo were made to be together!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I love chorizo and feta with pasta! I made a similar pasta with papardelle and it was so well received. I can imagine pumpkin really adds to it! :)
item.content:encoded: I love chorizo and feta with pasta! I made a similar pasta with papardelle and it was so well received. I can imagine pumpkin really adds to it! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Interesting flavour combination. Pumpkin is not something I normally go for, but the chorizo and fetta should add some good saltiness.
item.content:encoded: Interesting flavour combination. Pumpkin is not something I normally go for, but the chorizo and fetta should add some good saltiness.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Any recipe with feta can't fail! Oh it's so delish :) And the fact that you paired it with pumpkin....sublime :)
item.content:encoded: Any recipe with feta can’t fail! Oh it’s so delish ðŸ™‚ And the fact that you paired it with pumpkin….sublime ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Sounds like your leftovers have lead to a beautiful new dish. I love pumpkin and fetta, so I'll have to try this one.
item.content:encoded: Sounds like your leftovers have lead to a beautiful new dish. I love pumpkin and fetta, so I’ll have to try this one.

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Looks very tasty! Pumpkin and feta are a great combination :) I don't know why I've never used it in a pasta sauce before!
item.content:encoded: Looks very tasty! Pumpkin and feta are a great combination ðŸ™‚ I don’t know why I’ve never used it in a pasta sauce before!

item.title: By: Parita
item.dc:creator: Parita
item.description: looks good, send it to Presto Pasta nights!
item.content:encoded: looks good, send it to Presto Pasta nights!
